name: places/ChIJsWr3iulYwokRHAP5Mw2qrHU
formattedAddress: 215 E 68th St, New York, NY 10065, USA
adrFormatAddress: 215 E 68th St, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: Put aside the extreme accomplishments of this Dr. He and his staff cold not be more kind and attentive.  I know offices are hectic and Drs come in and run out, the Doc makes you feel like you are the only soul around.  He listens, takes notes and walks you through everything.     I could not have been more pleasantly surprised.  I would recommend this Dr and his staff to anyone.

originalText.text: Fantastic service warm kind compassionate went the extra mile! Much appreciated in today's world!

text.text: Fantastic service warm kind compassionate went the extra mile! Much appreciated in today's world!

originalText.text: World-class physician and gentleman.  Dr. Martorella is kind, compassionate, insightful and smart.  He is genuinely interested in the overall well-being of his patients, and thoughtfully listens to and addresses all symptoms and concerns.  He also answers any questions both during the visit and after, and methodically follows up with test results within two-three days.  He even does the blood-draws himself, and there's never any pain or subsequent bruising.  Finally, Dr. Martorella is unfailingly respectful and considerate, and I'm always struck by how he personally escorts his patients to and from his office.  I consider myself so fortunate to have been referred to him and know I am in good hands.

text.text: World-class physician and gentleman.  Dr. Martorella is kind, compassionate, insightful and smart.  He is genuinely interested in the overall well-being of his patients, and thoughtfully listens to and addresses all symptoms and concerns. He even does the blood-draws himself, and there's never any pain or subsequent bruising. I consider myself so fortunate to have been referred to him and know I am in good hands.

originalText.text: Dr. Martorella is the best doctor I have ever gone to.  I was sick for 6 mos, had seen countless specialists (including other endocrinologists) and had so many tests performed.  I will forever be grateful to him and his diagnosis because over the last 3 mos he has given me back my life...something I didn't think would ever happen.  On top of being the greatest doctor, he is a truly nice man.  Thank you SO much Dr. M!!

text.text: Dr. Martorella is the best doctor I have ever gone to.  I was sick for 6 mos, had seen countless specialists (including other endocrinologists) and had so many tests performed.  I will forever be grateful to him and his diagnosis because over the last 3 mos he has given me back my life...something I didn't think would ever happen.  On top of being the greatest doctor, he is a truly nice man.  Thank you SO much Dr. M!!

originalText.text:
A great endocrinologist, even greater person. Dr Martorella is the quintessential "great bedside manner" physician.

I have a very difficult autoimmune case of Hashimoto's hypothyroidism, and he has never wavered in his support of my care and well-being for a moment.

He is willing to look critically outside the box for solutions and confers with my other physicians.

I have absolutely no hesitation in referring him.
